comment._content: Vivienne Sonia Segal (April 19, 1897 - December 29, 1992) was an American actress and singer. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vivienne_Segal

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: She made her Broadway debut in the hit musical/operetta "Blue Paradise" in August,1915 at the age of 18. According to "The World of Musical Comedy", her career began in storybook manner: She was hired when, with only four days of rehearsal left, the producers decided the actress playing the lead was not right for the part. They took a chance on Segal, a teenage student from Philadelphia's Curtis Institute of Music, and her long career was born. books.google.com/books?id=iUJPcFgsEyYC&lpg=PA43&o...
